• Feb 20, 2017

    04. Rainbow custom cards and music player.

    Next our team has decided to add custom cards and player to Rainbow, which will allow users to listen to music with out stopping. In addition custom players will allow us to create light weight music cards which will be easier to load then the soundcloud embeds.

  • Feb 16, 2017

    03. eego - a place to create collections for your workflow.

    After busting my brain a little longer, I came up with eego. We want users collections to resemeble oneself, similar to an eego.

  • Feb 15, 2017

    02. Branding a place to create collections for your workflow.

    Recently have been exploring the brand identity for a tool that helps people collect content from across the web that can improve their workflow.

    Here is a proposed logo mark.

    The experience can be enjoyed here.

  • Feb 12, 2017

    01. This is an activity sheet.

    My previous activity sheet gave me a weird taste in my mouth so I created a new one. Here is a link to the previous one.

    Over the weekend Ryan, Sid and I completed our first working version of Rainbow. The experience displays a list of the people the user is following on Soundcloud. When a user selects a person they area able to view their likes. Next we are working on creating our own custom player and building the experience on mobile.
